pkgmetadata.longdescription: Relative Growth Rate // Calculates the relative growth rate (RGR) of a series of individuals by building a life table and solving the Lotka-Birch equation. (See Birch, L. C. 1948. The intrinsic rate of natural increase of an insect population. - Journal of Animal Ecology 17: 15-26) doi:10.2307/1605.
